Uses of Class
suncertify.db.RecordNotFoundException

  • Packages that use RecordNotFoundException 
    Package Description
    suncertify.db
    This package holds the classes relevant to all the operations around processing and interacting with the db file and DBCache.
    suncertify.model
    This package holds the classes relating to the Model of the MVC architecture and also the Room object.
    suncertify.server
    This package holds the classes relevant to the networked aspect of the application, how it is set up and how it is accessed remotely.
    suncertify.view
    This package holds the View of the MVC architecture and hence all the GUI classes.

      Checks if the passed record is locked or unlocked.
      boolean Data.isLocked(long recNo) 
      java.lang.Long LockingManager.lock(long recNo)
      Allows the record passed in to be locked by a client so cannot be modified by another client.

      long Data.lockRecord(long recNo)
